import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/{OrganizationId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a single organization record by OrganizationId. Use this when you need to change organization metadata such as name, contact details, or insurance fields for an existing organization.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organizations-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Retrieve the current organization record to identify fields to change.
2. Call [PUT /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}/update](/docs/api/organizations/update-organization) with the updated fields.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationId path parameter plus the fields you intend to update.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an organization.","properties":{"OrganizationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"OrganizationStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"Name":{"type":"string"},"Phone":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"OrganizationUrl":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"ContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"ContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"AdditionalContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"AdditionalContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"ImageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"InsuranceFileId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"InsuranceCarrier":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"InsurancePolicyNumber":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"InsuranceEffectiveDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"InsuranceExpirationDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true}},"title":"UpdateOrganizationRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
